trans-unit.source: Maintains a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> objects by name.
trans-unit.target: 依名稱維護 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要新增到集合的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object to the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> 物件新增至 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The configuration provider in <paramref name="builder" /> must implement the class <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="builder" /> 中的設定提供者必須實作類別 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object from the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> that is configured with the provided name.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilderCollection" /> 取得 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> 物件，前者以所提供的名稱設定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> object that is configured with the provided <paramref name="name" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationBuilder" /> 物件，以所提供的 <paramref name="name" /> 設定。
